start.description: This is the start time for the data request formatted as YYYYMMDD.
start.title: Start Time

end.description: This is the end time for the data request formatted as YYYYMMDD.
end.title: End Time

latitude.description: This is the point latitude value.
latitude.title: Latitude Value

longitude.description: This is the point longitude value.
longitude.title: Longitude Value

community.description: The user community to return units for.
community.title: User Community

parameters.description: A comma delimited list of the parameter abbreviations.
parameters.title: Parameter Abbreviations

user.description: A user name for identification purposes.
user.title: User Name

header.description: To show or hide the header files of CSV and ASCII formats.
header.title: File Header

time-standard.description: The time standard to return timestamps for.
time-standard.title: Time Standard

site-elevation.description: The custom site elevation in meters to produce the corrected atmospheric pressure adjusted for elevation.
site-elevation.title: Site Elevation

wind-elevation.description: The custom wind elevation in meters to produce the wind speed adjusted for elevation.
wind-elevation.title: Wind Elevation

wind-surface.description: The definable surface type to adjusted the wind speed.
wind-surface.title: Wind Surface Type
